mapper.select: SELECT T1.PDLV_NO , T1.PDLV_DV_CD , T1.DATA_DL_YN , T1.APY_STRTDT FROM (SELECT B1.PDLV_NO , B1.PDLV_DV_CD , B1.DTA_DL_YN AS DATA_DL_YN , H1.APY_STRTDT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY H1.APY_STRTDT DESC) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_PDLV_BAS B1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_PDLV_HIST H1 ON B1.PDLV_NO = H1.PDLV_NO AND H1.APY_ENDDT = ( SELECT MAX(APY_ENDDT) FROM TB_SVPD_PDLV_HIST WHERE H1.PDLV_NO = PDLV_NO ) WHERE B1.PDLV_NO = #{pdlvNo} AND B1.PDLV_DV_CD = #{pdlvDvCd} ) T1 WHERE T1.RN = 1
